columns.Wrestler_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each wrestler in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the wrestler.
columns.Reign: The count of the championship reign for the wrestler.
columns.Days_held: The total number of days the wrestler has held the championship title.
columns.Location: The location where the championship event took place.
columns.Event: The type or name of the event in which the wrestler participated.

wrestler.table_description: The wrestler table stores information about professional wrestlers, including their unique identifiers, names, championship reigns, duration of title holdings, event locations, and the nature of the events they participated in.

columns.Elimination_ID: A unique identifier for each elimination event in the dataset.
columns.Wrestler_ID: The identifier for the wrestler who was eliminated, referencing their entry in the wrestler table.
columns.Team: The name of the team to which the eliminated wrestler belonged during the elimination event.
columns.Eliminated_By: The name of the wrestler who performed the elimination on the specified wrestler.
columns.Elimination_Move: The specific move used by the eliminating wrestler to achieve the elimination.
columns.Time: The elapsed time in the match at which the elimination occurred, formatted as minutes and seconds.

Elimination.table_description: The Elimination table records the details of each elimination event that occurs in a wrestling match, including identifiers for the wrestlers, the teams they represent, and the specifics of how and when they were eliminated.
